Resources

Open content that inspires us:

  • A11ysupport.io - A11ysupport on GitHub
  • a11y.css - a11y.css on GitHub
  • Accessibility Guide by 18F - 18F Guide on GitHub
  • Accessibility Guidelines by Voxmedia - Accessibility Guidelines Checklist on GitHub
  • Digital Accessibility Toolkit by Government of Canada - Digital Accessibility Toolkit on GitHub
  • Accessibility Posters by UK’s Home Office Digital - Posters on GitHub
  • Accessibility Manual by UK’s DWP - Accessibility Manual on GitHub
  • Accessibility for Teams USA Gov - Accessibility for Teams on GitHub
  • HTML5 Accessibility by Steve Faulkner - HTML5 Accessibility on GitHub
  • A11yProject.com - A11yProject.com on GitHub
  • A11y.coffee - A11y Coffee on GitHub

Drupal Modules for Accessibility

  • Accessibility Scanner - Sitewide Drupal Scan (Achecker)
  • A11Y: Form helpers - Fixing form issues like the HTML5 validation.
  • Block ARIA Landmark Roles - Adding semantics to blocks
  • CKEditor Abbreviation - CKEditor Plugin
  • CKEditor Accessibility Auditor - WYSIWYG Scanner (HTML CodeSniffer)
  • Editoria11y - WYSIWYG Scanner (Tota11y)
  • Fluidproject UI Options - Preference Editor Widget
  • High contrast - High Contrast Module
  • htmLawed - HTML Validity Filter
  • HTML Purifier - HTML Validity Filter
